extension_description.message: A mod loader for Level Share Square web/HTML5 games.

header_main.description: The name of the extension, used in the popup menu

header_manager.description: The menu in which you can add/remove mods

remove_mod.description: The name of the button to remove a mod completely

open_manager.description: The name of the button to open the manager

reload_mods.description: The name of the button to reload the mods

reload_mods_reminder.description: The name of the button to reload the mods to remind the user to hard refresh

reload_mods_tooltip.message: CTRL+SHIFT+R will reload the game without cached images, forcing mods to be enabled.
reload_mods_tooltip.description: The tooltip of the button to give information about hard reload

reload_mods_error.message: Error reloading mods, try refreshing and/or opening a different page.
reload_mods_error.description: Error message if reloading mods fails.

close_popup.description: The name of the button to close the popup

load_modpack.description: The name of the button to load a new modpack

no_mods.message: You haven't loaded any mods yet.
no_mods.description: The message to display when there are no mods loaded

remove_mod_confirm.message: Are you sure you want to permanently remove this mod? You will need to reload it from the files on your device to use it again.
remove_mod_confirm.description: The message to confirm the deletion of a mod

imageroot_warning.message: No images found in the specified 'Images' folder of the root folder! Make sure you set the correct folder name.
imageroot_warning.description: Debug message to warn the user if there are no images found in the specified folder OR if the folder doesn't exist.

incompatible_mod.message: This mod was built under a different version of the game: It may work properly, or it may not.
incompatible_mod.description: The name of the message to display when a mod is incompatible with the current game version

game_versions_header.description: The name of the header to display game versions

upload_modpack_description.message: Upload a modpack folder with a valid loader.json file inside to load it:
upload_modpack_description.description: Description explaining what to upload and what it should contain

unknown_game_warning.message: This modpack is for an unknown game, do you wish to proceed?
unknown_game_warning.description: The message to warn the user whether the modpack has an unknown game in its loader.json file

outdated_mod_warning.message: The latest game version is $game_version$, but this modpack is for $modpack_game_version$. Do you want to proceed?
outdated_mod_warning.description: The message to warn the user whether the mod may no longer work

invalid_json_error.description: The message to warn the user if the loader.json file is invalid

missing_json_error.message: This isn't a valid modpack folder, make sure it has a loader.json file at the root!
missing_json_error.description: The message to warn the user if the loader.json file is missing

empty_folder_error.message: This folder is empty! Please upload a valid modpack folder.
empty_folder_error.description: The message to warn the user if the folder they selected is empty

game_version_retrieval_error.description: The message to warn the user if the game versions could not be retrieved

game_detected_header.description: The name of the header to display when a game is detected

unknown_game_or_version.description: The name of the header to display when a game is detected that is unknown to the LSS api

missing_fields_error.message: This loader JSON file is missing the following fields: $fields$.
missing_fields_error.description: The message to warn the user if the loader.json file is missing fields

click_to_disable.description: The toggle tooltip that displays when a mod is enabled

click_to_enable.description: The toggle tooltip that displays when a mod is disabled

duplicate_key_warning.message: Your loader.json file can't contain rootfolder keys that are exactly the same as regular keys!
duplicate_key_warning.description: The message to warn the user if the loader.json file contains duplicate keys with its rootfolder
